document.full_text: kosuke kimura, the only japanese player in major league soccer, is seeking help for his countrymen and women affected by last week's earthquake and tsunami.
document.title: only japanese player in m.l.s. seeks help for people at home
lines_and_colors: kosuke kimura, the only japanese player in major league soccer, is seeking help for his countrymen and women affected by last week's earthquake and tsunami.
